com.example.lab_net

Class SearchableList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.lab_net.SearchableList

  • public class SearchableList
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class which will allows a list to be referenced and fed results from a database query.

      • SearchableList

        public SearchableList(androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity parentActivity,
                      android.widget.ListView toWrap,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Searchable> data)
        Creates a new SearchableList from a ListView and an ArrayList
        Parameters:
        parentActivity - The parent AppCompatActivity for the SearchableList to use when changing activities.
        toWrap - The ListView to reference.
        data - The list that holds the data that the ListView displays.

        Parameters:
        query - The string query to run
